review: I love this, so easy to use & tons of options for movies & TV shows.  At first I couldn't figure out how to view all the options, but then I got the hand of it.  A great bargain as well.
author: Vickie Morales

review: I gave this Fire TV Stick to a friend, didn't know I had to pay for the movies!!!!!
author: EMMA

review: Love it and all the features it has. Wasn't aware that there would be 100 free games to play on our large tv. love it.
author: Denise C.

review: I like what I see so far.
author: Mark Hughes

review: So far everything works great. Had to set it up twice but subsection no problems.
author: Edward Gagnon

review: This is a great product, already told a friend, and cancelled my cable. Very easy to set up.
author: wade horton
